title: My French SIM card is not supported in my US phone, any suggestions on how to resolve this?
content: When I insert my French SIM card into my US Pixel 3A phone, I get a message saying it is not supported, then 'tap here for Verizon contact details'. The webpage is on the Verizon site, but I'm not a Verizon customer as I live in France not the US. Thanks for any suggestions.
